data.name: Cattails: Wildwood Story Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Over 120 minutes of original kitten-inspired music from Cattails: Wildwood Story!

As the seasons progress, so does the music. Everything from chill beats to listen to while decorating your den to intense combat tracks can be found in this jazz-inspired album!

Composed by Tormod Garvin. Live musical talent is provided by accompanists Naomi Sullivan and Alex Hill-Knight. Cover art by Nana Qi.
